string.name: stop_device
string.value: Disconnect to stop using this device's %1$s.

string.name: continue_desc
string.value: Start viewing, editing, or streaming content on one device, then instantly continue on another device using the same HUAWEI ID.

string.name: continue_privacy_text
string.value: This service uses Bluetooth and Wi-Fi. During use, it will read this device's name and send it to devices you hop to. By turning this on, you agree to these terms.
